mods.abstract: World's record tarpon to be caught on 72-thread line, and winner of the New Orleans Tarpon Club's 1951 city limits rodeo. This tarpon, captured by Oswald "Ed" Frey on Sept. 9, at Point Aux Herbes, in Lake Ponchartrain, weighed 198 pounds and eight ounces, and was taken with a live mullet as bait.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
